title: Chevron Agrees to Explore Oil and Gas Work in Syria
summary_full: Chevron has signed an initial agreement to start working in Syria, weeks after the Syrian government seized control of key oil and gas fields in the north of the country.
summary_public: Chevron has signed an initial agreement to start working in Syria, weeks after the Syrian government seized control of key oil and gas fields in the north of the country.

SY.label: negative
SY.evidence: Chevron Agrees to Explore Oil and Gas Work in Syria
